articles.description: Television legend Bruce Forsyth left his beloved wife more than £11m in his will but she could no longer face living in the home they shared after losing her husband
articles.content:
Sir Bruce Forsyth's heartbroken widow Wilnelia has moved into a new £5million home nearly three years after his death.
